title: Telemetry via Instana by IBM
description:
Enterprise only. Send metrics and traces to your Instana dashboard.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

AgentHost.title: Agent Host
AgentHost.description:
By default Instana uses localhost.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

Service.title: Service
Service.description:
The global service name that will be used to identify the program in the Instana backend. The service name is set to the name of current executable by default..

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

MaxBufferedSpans.title: Max buffered spans
MaxBufferedSpans.description:
The maximum number of spans to buffer.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

ForceTransmissionStartingAt.title: Force transmission starting at
ForceTransmissionStartingAt.description:
The number of spans to collect before flushing the buffer to the agent.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

LogLevel.title: Log level
LogLevel.description:
One of Error 0, Warn 1, Info 2 or Debug 3.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

EnableAutoProfile.title: Enable auto profile
EnableAutoProfile.description:
Enables automatic continuous process profiling when true.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

MaxBufferedProfiles.title: Max buffered profiles
MaxBufferedProfiles.description:
The maximum number of profiles to buffer.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

IncludeProfilerFrames.title: Include profiler frames
IncludeProfilerFrames.description:
Whether to include profiler calls into the profile or not.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

DropAllLogs.title: Drop all logs
DropAllLogs.description:
Turns log events on all spans into no-ops.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

MaxLogsPerSpan.title: Max logs per span
MaxLogsPerSpan.description:
MaxLogsPerSpan limits the number of log records in a span (if set to a non-zero value). If a span has more logs than this value, logs are dropped as necessary.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

Secrets.title: Secrets
Secrets.description:
A secrets matcher used to filter out sensitive data from HTTP requests, database connection strings, etc. By default tracer does not filter any values.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/

CollectableHTTPHeaders.title: Collectable HTTP headers
CollectableHTTPHeaders.description:
Case-insensitive list of HTTP headers to be collected from HTTP requests and sent to the agent.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/telemetry/instana/
